thread.title: Jefferson Co. Leaders Tackling Sewer Problem Monday Night
thread.title_full: Jefferson Co. Leaders Tackling Sewer Problem Monday Night

title: Jefferson Co. Leaders Tackling Sewer Problem Monday Night
text:
Jefferson Co. Leaders Tackling Sewer Problem Monday Night   11, 2015 at 9:21   11, 2015 at 10:33 PM CDT Related Content Plumbing Problems at Jefferson County Courthouse 
MT. VERNON -- Members of the Jefferson County Board are gathering for a special meeting Monday night to see if they can agree on a solution to the courthouse's sewer woes. 
When News 3's Evie Allen took a look at the situation last Tuesday, she found porta-potties in the courthouse's parking lot . She reports there were lots of jokes about coming to the courthouse to do business --- but not having a place to DO your business. 
There's only one public bathroom available after a plumbing crew caused a pipe to burst. 
All kidding aside, fixing the pipe is going to be costly. Estimates are that county leaders will have to find about $90,000 for the project. 
Board members will meet for their special session at 6 p.m. Monday in Courtroom A on the second floor of the courthouse.
